name: Weed Wackers
description:
David KozdraWeed Wackers (aka Plant Game) is a two player fighting game made in the SIM lab for the Florida Polytechnic University game expo. This game is a demonstration of using motion capture for animation in game development.

Controls:MovementPunchP1:WASDFP2:Arrow KeysNum 5

Credits:

Year 1:

  • Orion Mendes – Programming, modeling
  • David Kozdra - Programming
  • Kenny Diaz – Modeling, Environmental Design
  • Keagan MacDonald – UI/Graphics, Prop Modeling
  • Devin Ryan – Modeling/Design
  • Constantine Stefanakos – Video Documentation
  • Gabrielle Tristani - Sound Effects
  • Professor Navarro - Sound Design, Music

Year 2:

  • Kyle Barnett - Programing, Environmental Design, UI/Graphics
  • Chad Pool - Marketing
